document.full_text: two prominent members of yemen's ruling party resigned on saturday in protest against the killing of dozens of anti-government protesters, while troops enforced a state of emergency in the capital.
document.title: yemeni troops on streets as two party members quit
lines_and_colors: two prominent members of yemen's ruling party resigned on saturday in protest against the killing of dozens of anti-government protesters, while troops enforced a state of emergency in the capital.
